pageProduct.name: Oral B Teeth Whitening Toothpaste 3D White Luxe Perfection 95g
pageProduct.description:
Information

Whitens by unlocking trapped surface stains, giving whiter teeth in 3 days.
The cool minty formula leaves your smile feeling fresh and clean.
Protects against new stains to keep your smile looking bright.

General Information

Oral-B 3D White Luxe Perfection Toothpaste is our most advanced whitening technology which removes stains for whiter teeth in 3 days*.

*Whitens teeth by removing surface stains. Individual results may vary

Dissolving Polishing Complex:
- Whiter teeth in 3 days* 
- Whitens by unlocking trapped surface stains
- Protects against new stains
- Leaves your smile clean and fresh
-  #1 Toothbrush brand used by dentists worldwide

*Whitens teeth by removing surface stains. Individual results may vary

Size: 95g

KEY FEATURES

• Removes up to 100% of surface stains in 3 days
• Oral-B's fastest and most advanced whitening technology
• Innovative stains dissolving particles unlock trapped surface stains on teeth and protect against new stains
• Enamel safe formula
• Cool mint flavor with extra coolant for long-lasting freshness

Warnings

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 6 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

Ingredients

Contains Sodium Fluoride. Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Polyphosphate, Water, PEG-6, Flavour, Trisodium Phosphate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate , Carrageenan, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Mica, Sodium Saccharin, PEG-20M, Sodium Fluoride, Xanthan Gum, Sucralose, Sodium Benzoate, Silica, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, BHT, Potassium Sorbate, Titanium Dioxide, CI 74160.

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
